webscript.shortname: Removes specified Custom Reference Instance from the specified node
webscript.description:
The custom reference instance will be removed from the specified node.
For bidirectional references the refId is simply the label. For parentchild references
the refId is the source and target concatenated and separated by a slash
e.g. "source__target".
The nodeRef encoded within the URL path is the 'fromNode' in the relationship.
The nodeRef encoded within the query string is the 'toNode' in the relationship.
